content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This course is designed for all EPAM employees. You are required to pass the course to familiarize yourself with the occupational safety legal requirements.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In conclusion, you will need to confirm that you have read, understood, are complying, and will continue to comply with the requirements of occupational safety, fire safety and electrical safety. For better learning, tests are provided at the end of the course.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After completing the course, you need to contact the Occupational Safety Officer at your location to sign the appropriate instruction journals.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please, read the document below:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/56b66707-9046-451f-86e5-64a7576eefb6/%D0%98%D0%BD%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%B8%20English.pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Introductory briefing on workplace safety and instructional briefing leading to the conferment of level 1 qualification for electrical safety for non-electrical personnel\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
